title: Rishi Sunak – 2022 Letter of Resignation as Chancellor of the Exchequer
author: admin
summary: The letter of resignation from Rishi Sunak, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, sent to Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, on 5 July 2022.
